### writeBytes() {#abfb56d37310ba6de3d4bc923eab7aa61}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;BinaryStreamRef.cpp&#125;::MutableArrayRefImpl::writeBytes (uint64&#95;t Offset, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; uint8&#95;t &gt; Data)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Attempt to write the given bytes into the stream at the desired offset.

This will always necessitate a copy. Cannot shrink or grow the stream, only writes into existing allocated space.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/binarystreamref-cpp/#l00052">52</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/binarystreamref-cpp">BinaryStreamRef.cpp</a>.
